verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Let Thy glory, Lord, be my passion
Let me bring joy to Thy Father Heart
Be all that Thou dost want
In sons and daughters
And love Thee only for who Thou Art

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As Christ Thy Son didst ever
Live to please Thee
So let my life by obedience be marked

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Help me be all You ask of sons and daughters
And love Thee Father for who Thou art.
